The leaked e: mail was from Bill Ivey, a senior policy fellow for Americans for the Arts and trustee of the Center for American Progress, and former National Endowment for the Arts chairman under Bill Clinton.
The e: mail was dated March 13, 2016, and was sent from the email address bi@globalculturalstrategies.com to john.podesta@gmail.com.
The content of the e: mail discusses the challenges facing American democracy and mentions the need for an "unaware" and "compliant" citizenry.
